summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2474, for the improvement of Seattle Boulevard, from Maynard Avenue to 9th Avenue South; 9th Avenue South from Seattle Boulevard to Holgate Street; all in the City of Seattle, by planking and replanking; by construction or reconstruction of wooden walks; by construction of wooden curbs and gutters, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 26815 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
